products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Plum Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. A dark berry shade, this blackout plum colour adds a colour without being too bright - great for pairing with a grey wall and accessories or natural darker wood-colour furnishings. Product id: db-nfpl0042 fabric colour: plum material: 100% polyester lining: reflective blackout silver backing - uv blocking headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackouttaupe beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Unishade Blackout Fr Beige Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Offering complete light blockage & resistentance to moisture. Their stunning unishade range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. Product id: sdb-pfr0601 fabric colour: beige material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes unishade blackout fr beige perfect fit roller blind in cream.

products.title: Devon Sand Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, their devon range of roller blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Sand will introduce a stylish, earthy shade into your interiors. A fabulously warm grey/brown hue.
